TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ValidationCompareOperator extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the validation comparison operators used by the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator> enumeration represents the comparison operations that can be performed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator> control.
> [!NOTE] > Unlike the other operators, `DataTypeCheck` is a unary operation. Only the data type of the input control being validated is checked. If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator.ControlToCompare%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator.ValueToCompare%2A> properties are set when this operation is used, those values are not checked.
## Examples
> [!IMPORTANT] > This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
<!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-csharp[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] --> <!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-vb[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] -->

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator DataTypeCheck = int32(6)

Docs.summary: A comparison for data type only.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator Equal = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator GreaterThan = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator GreaterThanEqual = int32(3)

Docs.summary: A comparison for greater than or equal to.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator LessThan = int32(4)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator LessThanEqual = int32(5)

Docs.summary: A comparison for less than or equal to.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator NotEqual = int32(1)
